description: Describes the folder resolved permissions. Permissions consists of both folder direct permissions and the inherited permissions from the ancestor folders.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID for the Amazon Web Services account that contains the folder.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the folder.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: Information about the permissions for the folder.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token for the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.
